extendedInfo.description: XMAS TREE  Live Wallpaper Free use as screensaver on your home screen oAndroid phone or tablet.Bring the Christmas spirit to your home screen with Christmas Tree Live Wallpaper Winter Snowflakes Live Wallpaper free!Instructions to install it:- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for " Live Wallpaper"- select "XMAS TREE" to select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.The most beautiful interactive X-mas Snowflakes Live Wallpaper HD for Xmas & New Year Snow ! XMAS TREE Live Wallpaper and New Year Snowfall Live Wallpapers for your Android device Free.How-to: Home > Press Menu > Wallpapers > Live Wallpapers XMAS TREE live wallpaper Doesn't need Internet connection
